sn35.76:1.2: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.76:1.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn35.76:1.4: “Yaṃ kho, rādha, aniccaṃ tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.76:1.5: Kiñca, rādha, aniccaṃ tatra te chando pahātabbo?
sn35.76:1.8: yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccaṃ. Tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn35.76:1.11: mano anicco. Tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.76:1.15: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccaṃ. Tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.76:1.16: Yaṃ kho, rādha, aniccaṃ tatra te chando pahātabbo”ti.
